Plot: Shortly after their first western adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and set out to discover its secrets.
Title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
Writer: Lowell Ganz (characters), Babaloo Mandel (characters), Billy Crystal, Lowell Ganz, Babaloo Mandel
Actors: Billy Crystal, Daniel Stern, Jon Lovitz, Jack Palance
